{"id":461381664,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1614454019,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/461381664/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Divide Two Integers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool mult(int x, int y, int val) {\n        int a = 0;\n        \n        while(y) {\n            if (y&1) {\n                --y;\n                if (INT_MAX - a < x) {\n                    return false;\n                }\n                a = (x + a);\n            } else {\n                y >>= 1;\n                if (INT_MAX - x < x) {\n                    return false;\n                }\n                x = x + x;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return a <= val;\n    }\n    \n    int divide(int dividend, int divisor) {\n        \n        if (dividend == INT_MIN) {\n            if (divisor == -1) {\n                return INT_MAX;\n            }\n            return divide(dividend + 1, divisor) + divide(-1, divisor); \n        }\n        \n        int sign = 1;\n        if (dividend < 0) sign = (sign + 1) % 2;\n        if (divisor < 0) sign = (sign + 1) % 2;\n        \n        if (dividend < 0) {\n            dividend = dividend - dividend - dividend;\n        }\n        if (divisor < 0) {\n            divisor = divisor - divisor - divisor;\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        \n        int l = 1;\n        int r = INT_MAX;\n        int mid;\n        while(l <= r) {\n            mid = l + ((r - l)>>1);\n            if (!mult(divisor, mid, dividend)) {\n                r = mid - 1;\n            } else {\n                ans = mid;\n                if (mid == INT_MAX) {\n                    break;\n                }\n                l = mid + 1;\n            }\n        }\n        return sign?ans:ans - ans - ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"divide-two-integers"}
